shortdesc.ph: Pushes the external encoded video frame to the SDK.

p.codeblock: virtual int pushEncodedVideoImage(const uint8_t* imageBuffer, size_t length, const agora::rtc::EncodedVideoFrameInfo& videoEncodedFrameInfo) = 0;
public abstract int PushEncodedVideoImage(byte[] imageBuffer, uint length, EncodedVideoFrameInfo videoEncodedFrameInfo, uint videoTrackId = 0);

section.p: After calling to enable external video source and set the sourceType parameter to , you can call this method to push the encoded external video frame to the SDK.

plentry.pd: The buffer of the external encoded video frame.
The length of the external encoded video frame.
The information about the external encoded video frame. See .

ul.li: 0: Pushes the external encoded video frame to the SDK successfully.
< 0: Fails to push the external encoded video frame to the SDK.
